title: Continuous Delivery with Visual Studio and TFS
sessionTitle: Continuous Delivery with Visual Studio and TFS
eventShortDescription:
​Is Deployment costing you too much?

Deploying early and often delivers business value fast, generates early customer feedback and ensures "Go Live" day end with a bottle of French Champagne, in place of a sleepless night. You will see the beauty of TFS Build and then dive into the new world of the cloud and see TFS Build on Azure.

Learn why continuous delivery and deploying with TFS, is an investment you should be making today.
